name: places/ChIJnaghR_31wokRR75FIYY2rZk
adrFormatAddress: 2276 1st Ave., New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: I rarely write review, but recent experienced warranted a review. Make sure to have them process the return while you are present at the location. We returned the truck in a few hours after we rented it but the location did not process the return for 2 days and when I called back to get it fixed they gave me run around. Had to call U-Haul customer service to get the issue resolved. This rating would have be complete opposite had they processed the return same day or at least given us proper response to help fix the return date

originalText.text: I had a reservation that was changed at 6:40am day of pick up. Worker refused to honor the reservation and payment I had made weeks in advance. U-Haul called location management to hold the truck for the time being, but worker gave away truck to someone else after the 1 hour grace period despite being told not to do so. Worker taunted us for not paying the price on the spot (which was far more than the original quote due to the non-consensual change made that morning), as he gave the truck away to another customer. Hope I never have to deal with this ever again. If you’re transferred to this location or have to pickup, beware!

originalText.text: DO NOT RENT FROM THIS PLACE... They do not keep reservations. I had an emergency job and I reserved a UHAUL 5 days in advance. When we got there to get our rental, their systems were down. They offered ZERO APOLOGY! If you need unprofessionalism, then this horrible place is the place to rent from.

text.text: DO NOT RENT FROM THIS PLACE... They do not keep reservations. I had an emergency job and I reserved a UHAUL 5 days in advance. When we got there to get our rental, their systems were down. They offered ZERO APOLOGY! If you need unprofessionalism, then this horrible place is the place to rent from.

originalText.text:
If there was a zero star, I would have given them zero star. Luckily, I was relocated to this dealer to pick up my truck, and they told me my reservation is not in the system, and I should check other dealer around this place, which is totally a lie. So I went the other dealer located between 2th and 3th on 117th, the guy called uhaul, transferred my reservation to his system, and rented me his truck.

This dealer won’t rent us the truck for some reasons which I don’t understand at all. But never pick up your truck from this spot!
